title: scikit-learn’s EuroScipy 2011 coding sprint -- day two
description: Today's coding sprint was a bit more crowded, with some notable scipy hackers such as Ralph Gommers, Stefan van der Walt, David Cournapeau or Fernando Perez from Ipython joining in. On what got done: - We merged Jake's new BallTree code. This is a pure Cython implementation of a nearest-neighbor …
dc:creator: Fabian Pedregosa
